notes.text:
This update for libqt5-qtimageformats fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-19871: Fixed CPU exhaustion in QTgaFile (bsc#1118598)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. There is QTgaFile Uncontrolled Resource Consumption.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
